description: Ransomware detected on finance department file server. Initial vector was phishing email.
resolution: Isolated system and restored from backup. Enhanced email filtering deployed.

description: Unusual outbound traffic detected from HR systems during off-hours.
resolution: Forensic analysis in progress. Network traffic captured for review.

description: Campaign targeting executives with fake DocuSign requests.
resolution: 47 emails blocked. User awareness alert sent to all staff.

description: PUP detected on contractor laptop during routine scan.
resolution: Software removed. User retrained on download policies.

description: Indicators of APT presence detected. Lateral movement suspected.
resolution: Emergency response activated. External IR firm engaged.

description: Former employee accessed files after termination.
resolution: Access revoked. Legal team notified. Audit of all terminated accounts initiated.

description: Volumetric DDoS attack against public-facing website.
resolution: Traffic scrubbed via CDN. Attack lasted 4 hours.

description: Vulnerability discovered in vendor-provided software component.
resolution: Patch pending from vendor. Compensating controls implemented.

description: Unauthorized USB device connected to classified workstation.
resolution: Device confiscated. User counseled. No data loss confirmed.

description: Exploitation attempt of unpatched VPN vulnerability.
resolution: Emergency patching in progress. IDS signatures updated.

description: Multiple failed auth attempts from foreign IPs.
resolution: Accounts locked. Password reset enforced. MFA verification ongoing.

description: Malware detected in OT network segment.
